text:
The food in the dormitory is so delicious...
But I should watch out not to eat too much, right?

Haha, it's good that it's delicious.
You don't have to hold back, you know?

Huh? So if I end up gaining weight,
will you take responsibility, Producer?

W-Well... I guess I would... I'd take responsibility
and come up with a proper training menu for weight loss...
That sounds like a tough job!

Sigh... Maybe I should ask everyone in the
dormitory how they manage their meals.

Yeah... But it's good to see that Hana
seems to be enjoying dorm life.

I was worried since you just came from your
hometown, thinking you might feel lonely sometimes.

Yeah, it's always lively,
so I've never felt lonely with everyone around...

And also, having you as someone to talk to
like this, Producer, is a great support for me.
